thread.section_title: ClearBags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ClearBags | clearbags.com | 9 of 472
thread.title: Jessica

author: Jessica
title: Jessica
text: This is an incredible product. The clear food grade plastic is quality and works like a charm with secure fitting closures. These boxes also come with clear slide inserts that allow you to slide out the chocolates in order to easily reach the chocolate you want or reposition them with ease. Presentation is key! Thank you clear bags for making my vision for chocolate packaging become a reality.
